hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT JOB_ID, ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, LAYER, AREA_NAME, API_JSON, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, FIELD7, FIELD8, FIELD9, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID FROM EO_ORDER_LAYER WHERE 1=1 <<AND JOB_ID LIKE :jobId>> <<AND ORDER_NO LIKE :orderNo>> <<AND ITEM_NO LIKE :itemNo>> <<AND LAYER LIKE :layer>> <<AND AREA_NAME LIKE :areaName>> <<AND API_JSON LIKE :apiJson>> <<AND FIELD3 LIKE :field3>> <<AND FIELD4 LIKE :field4>> <<AND FIELD5 LIKE :field5>> <<AND FIELD6 LIKE :field6>> <<AND FIELD7 LIKE :field7>> <<AND FIELD8 LIKE :field8>> <<AND FIELD9 LIKE :field9>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND ORG_ID LIKE :orgId>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
